room_title: Escape room "Death Row" by Pikes Peak Escape Rooms in Colorado Springs
review: Loved the clues, so much to do and even harder to find the clues...the program gamers are out of this world with bizarre ideas and clues...weâ€™ll definitely be back.

room_title: Escape room "Death Row" by Pikes Peak Escape Rooms in Colorado Springs
review: We had a blast here! Had never done an escape room, but would highly recommend it. This was a team-building event for the office. We reserved two rooms and split into groups of six for each room. The "Death Row" room, considered intermediate, was a challenge. We thoroughly enjoyed it and completed it in 48 minutes. What a fun way to spend some time with friends, coworkers, family members, and really use your brain. You'll enjoy this!

room_title: Escape room "Death Row" by Pikes Peak Escape Rooms in Colorado Springs
review: Staff was very friendly, puzzles were fun to figure out. And when we got stuck, they gave us just enough assistance to help figure out the puzzle. Such a fun time!

room_title: Escape room "Death Row" by Pikes Peak Escape Rooms in Colorado Springs
review: Our entire group had a fantastic time and the clues were tough enough to keep us working hard but solvable, for us to be successful. We did the Death Row Room, amazingly well done!! Every detail was great. We will for sure all be returning to solve another room's mysteries. Suggestion .. only that it'd be fun to have a small champagne toast at the end for a celebration, even non alcoholic would be great, just a Toast to Team Work Well done!! Thank you for a fun evening!!
